reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MUSC 111, MUSC 200.
This course is for BMUS and BA - Music Majors and Minors. For prospective BA Music Majors and Minors ONLY: to register, e-mail music.advisor@ubc.ca Select MUSC 201 lecture + one tutorial.
BMUS students only.

description: Study of various forms in tonal music and the rhythmic, melodic, textural, and harmonic processes that create them on small and large scales. Compositional and analytical exercises.
